scripts.build-macos-linux: caxa --input . --exclude src dist/bin data node_modules --prepare-command "npm ci --production" --output dist/bin/nintendo-znc -- "{{caxa}}/node_modules/.bin/node" "{{caxa}}/bin/nxapi.js"
scripts.build-macosapp: caxa --input . --exclude src dist/bin data node_modules --prepare-command "npm ci --production" --output dist/bin/nintendo-znc.app -- "{{caxa}}/node_modules/.bin/node" "{{caxa}}/bin/nxapi.js" "presence"
scripts.build-windows: caxa --input . --exclude src dist/bin data node_modules --prepare-command "npm ci --production" --output dist/bin/nintendo-znc.exe -- "{{caxa}}/node_modules/.bin/node" "{{caxa}}/bin/nxapi.js"
